class.name: AbstractDatasetEntity
class.comment: Storage of the dataset, the core table of the whole database model.

column.name: dataset_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: discriminator
column.comment: Indicator used by Hibernate to distinguish between different types of datasets. Used e.g. for STA DatasetAggregations.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the dataset which can be used for filtering, e.g. GetObservationById in the SOS and can be encoded in WaterML 2.0 oder TimeseriesML 1.0 outputs.

column.name: sta_identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier used by SensorThingsAPI for addressing the entity. Should be a URI (reference to a vocabulary entry), UUID. E.g. 123, 123-321

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name of the dataset.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description of the dataset

column.name: first_time
column.comment: The timestamp of the temporally first observation that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: last_time
column.comment: The timestamp of the temporally last observation that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: result_time_start
column.comment: The timestamp of the earliest result time of the observations that belong to this dataset.

column.name: result_time_end
column.comment: The timestamp of the latest result time of the observations that belong to this dataset.

column.name: fk_procedure_id
column.comment: Reference to the procedure that belongs that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_phenomenon_id
column.comment: Reference to the phenomenon that belongs that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: Reference to the offering that belongs that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_category_id
column.comment: Reference to the category that belongs that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_feature_id
column.comment: Reference to the feature that belongs that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_platform_id
column.comment: Reference to the platform that belongs that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_unit_id
column.comment: Reference to the unit of the observations that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_format_id
column.comment: Reference to the observationType in the format table. Required by the SOS to persist the valid observationType for the dataset.

column.name: fk_aggregation_id
column.comment: Reference to the aggregation if this dataset belongs to one.

column.name: first_value
column.comment: The value of the temporally first observation that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: last_value
column.comment: The value of the temporally last quantity observation that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_first_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the temporally first observation in the observation table that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_last_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the temporally last observation in the observation table that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: dataset_type
column.comment: Indicator whether the dataset provides individualObservation (individual observations), timeseries (timeseries obervations) or trajectories (trajectory observations).

column.name: observation_type
column.comment: Indicator whether the dataset observations are of type simple (a simple observation, e.g. a scalar value like the temperature) or profile (profile observations)

column.name: value_type
column.comment: Indicator of the type of the single values. Valid values are quantity (scalar values), count (integer values), text (textual values), category (categorical values), bool (boolean values), reference (references, e.g. link to a source, photo, video)

column.name: is_deleted
column.comment: Flag that indicates if this dataset is deleted

column.name: is_disabled
column.comment: Flag that indicates if this dataset is disabled for insertion of new data

column.name: is_published
column.comment: Flag that indicates if this dataset should be published

column.name: is_mobile
column.comment: Flag that indicates if the procedure is mobile (1/true) or stationary (0/false).

column.name: is_insitu
column.comment: Flag that indicates if the procedure is insitu (1/true) or remote (0/false).

column.name: is_hidden
column.comment: Flag that indicates if this dataset should be hidden, e.g. for sub-datasets of a complex datasets

column.name: origin_timezone
column.comment: Define the origin timezone of the dataset timestamps. Possible values are offset (+02:00), id (CET) or full name (Europe/Berlin). It no time zone is defined, UTC would be used as default.

column.name: decimals
column.comment: Number of decimals that should be present in the output of the observation values. If no value is set, all decimals would be present.

list.name: referenceValues
list.comment: Storage of reference datasets, e.g. level zero, medium water level,etc. for water level.

column.name: fk_dataset_id_from
column.comment: Reference to the dataset that has reference datasets

column.name: sort_order
column.comment: Provides the sort order for the reference datasets.

column.name: fk_dataset_id_to
column.comment: Reference to the dataset that belongs to another dataset and provides values like level zero, medium water level,etc. for water level.

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the dataset identifier, reference to the codespace table. Can be null.

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the dataset name, reference to the codespace table. Can be null.

column.name: fk_value_profile_id
column.comment: Reference to the vertical metadata that belongs to this profile dataset.

column.name: is_samplings
column.comment: Flag that indicates if this dataset has samplings

set.name: samplings
set.comment: Storage of relations between dataset and related samplings

column.name: fk_dataset_id
column.comment: The reference to the dataset in the dataset table

column.name: fk_sampling_id
column.comment: The reference to the sampling in the dataset sampling

set.name: measuringPrograms
set.comment: Storage of relations between dataset and related measuring programs

column.name: fk_dataset_id
column.comment: The reference to the dataset in the dataset table

column.name: fk_measuring_program_id
column.comment: The reference to the measuring program in the dataset measuring program

set.name: tags
set.comment: Storage of relations between dataset and related tags

column.name: fk_dataset_id
column.comment: The reference to the dataset in the dataset table

column.name: fk_tag_id
column.comment: The reference to the tags in the tag dataset table

column.name: dataset_i18n_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: fk_dataset_id
column.comment: Reference to the dataset table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the dataset entity

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the dataset entity

database-object.create: CREATE INDEX idx_dataset_ts_s_cq ON ${schema}.dataset USING btree (dataset_type, observation_type, value_type, is_deleted, is_published, first_time, last_time) WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND is_published = 1 AND first_time IS NOT NULL AND last_time IS NOT NULL AND dataset_type = 'timeseries' AND observation_type = 'simple' AND value_type IN ('count', 'quantity')
